'''Dark Brightwood Flooring''' is a [[Furnishing]] item that can be used in the [[Serenitea Pot]].

The blueprint for Dark Brightwood Flooring is obtainable from the [[Realm Depot]] for {{Item|Realm Currency|24|x=160}}.

==Creation==
First time creation grants {{Item|Trust|24|x=60}}.

|type = Creation
|time = 14h
|Brightwood = 12
